page.description: Fires if there were any errors when uploading media files. If a record contains a media file that could not be uploaded successfully, the record will not be synched. The 'errorCount' parameter is the count of the number of records with errors. The 'array' parameter is an array of the media files that were uploaded. Some of the entries in this array will have have a 'succeeded' property that is false.

section.title: Parameters
section.description: This event passes several parameters when the Javascript code executes: array, errorCount
